title: Ida cannot open. a files of esp32 (Xtensa)
content:
I tried to open this file with IDA Pro https://github.com/espressif/esp32-wifi-lib/blob/master/esp32/libpp.a Ida detect that is ELF for Xtensa (relocatable) But when I tired to open it I got 
Undefined or unknown machine type 94
What can I do please?

answers_data.content: Xtensa support has been added in IDA 7.7.
